data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 4,112 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Catarina do Fogo, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 443 believers living in Santa Catarina do Fogo, Cape Verde.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 443 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Santa Catarina do Fogo, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: There are 5,300 people living in the state of Santa Catarina do Fogo. Only about 443 might be believers.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Santa Catarina do Fogo, Cape Verde to the gospel today.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Santa Catarina do Fogo words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.focus_label: Santa Catarina do Fogo, Cape Verde
data.section_summary:
the state of Santa Catarina do Fogo, Cape Verde has a population of 5,300.

We estimate Santa Catarina do Fogo has 443 people who might know Jesus, 4,112 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 744 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Santa Catarina do Fogo
location.full_name: Santa Catarina do Fogo, Cape Verde
